bio: The teacher who taught all the seaweed Yo-kai their squishy dance moves. Even in old age his sea-stepping skills are yet to dry out.

soultimate.name: Sucking Void
soultimate.description: Drain away foes' HP for yourself.

skill.effect: When HP falls to 0, recover up to three times with 1 HP.
skill.name: Stick 'Em Up

name: Seaweed Sensei
